features: Hydrate and Cleanse in 1 simple step with Neutrogena Healthy Scalp Hydro Boost Moisturizing Conditioner
Ideal for Dry Hair and Scalp: This conditioner helps add moisture to boost long lasting hydration
With Hyaluronic Acid: A hydrator found naturally in the skin that attracts moisture and locks it in
Gentle, Non Medicated Conditioner: Free from parabens, phthalates, sulfated surfactants, SLS and SLES
Helps Maintain Scalp's Natural Barrier: This nourishing pH balanced conditioner helps maintain scalp's natural barrier with regular use
body.description: Quench and condition in one simple step with this moisturizing scalp conditioner formulated with hydrating hyaluronic acid. It is great for dry scalp and hair, but suitable for all hair types including straight, wavy and curly hair. Plus it's safe for color-safe!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Neutrogena Healthy Scalp Clarify and Shine Shampoo with Pink Grapefruit exfoliates and cleanses hair and scalp in one simple step. Made especially for oily hair and scalp but suitable for all hair types including straight, wavy and curly hair, this clarifying shampoo helps gently exfoliate residue and build-up, promoting a more healthy scalp and hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I used this product for my dry scalp and it really works.....my hair feels silky smooth and no fly aways and I feel that it is good for my dry scalp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased for my husband and he said it has really helped his scalp n hair

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It works but how do you get at it?
reviews.reviewText: This product is the first to actually help with my dry, itchy scalp. However, the bottle is like a fortress, made of hard thick plastic. It's very hard to squeeze out the thick product from a tiny opening. No way you can balance it upside down as you can with some products. I'm tempted to try and break it open and put it in something more accessible. I'm pretty sure I won't be able to squeeze out the remaining third or so.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Treated my dry, flaky scalp
reviews.reviewText: Dandruff had my scalp out of whack. Dandruff shampoo helped the flaking short term but ultimately dried out my scalp so much that in the long term the result was even worse flaking. This product balanced everything out perfectly! I’m able to use the clinical strength dandruff shampoo to treat the oiliness and build up without the adverse effect of severe drying. I use this right after I shampoo with a scalp brush to ensure it really gets through the roots of my thick hair. It has resolved my scalp issues, and as an added bonus my hair is softer than ever. It feels healthy again! I have less frizziness and fly aways! Which I find crazy because I’m naturally a very frizzy gal, but even more so when using the dandruff shampoo since it’s very dehydrating and strips my hair of all the “good stuff”. 10/10 I recommend; but I do wish the bottle were easier to squeeze! Not for people with arthritis! Can easily be solved with a hand pump or other device that dispenses conditioner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Too thick to easily work through hair. Doesn't do much to fight dryness. Getting better results with less expensive product from Suave.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have very dry scalp and this is finally what I have been searching for. Gentle and the price is right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Used at cancer center
reviews.reviewText: We stayed at hotel on campus of world renowned cancer center. Inside hotel room they has Neutrogena shampoo and conditioner trial size bottles. Also stayed at Hilton and they had Neutrogena. If the cancer center and Hilton had this product I felt comfortable using it. It cleans hair and condition's hair. The price is reasonable I cannot use expensive products anymore as the Biden economy has created too much inflation and has limited my purchasing options. If you purchase high end products just for shampoo and conditioner it can cost $50 and up. $50 buys a few groceries or a tank of gas. I can't justify being selfish buying high end hair products when groceries or gas for car is needed. Besides hair is genetically predisposed to be curly, straight or wavy by the shape of hair follicles. Hair products can only put chemicals on outside cuticles of hair then it wears off with hairs natural oils and friction. You can flat iron and blow dry to break down bonds in the cuticles but over time it dries and breaks hair. You can chemically straighten hair but chemicals are bad for women even if they tell you it's more natural ingredients it's not. They must use chemicals to loosen the bonds in the hair shaft. Doctors found out the chemicals may cause cancer. The chemicals are inhaled or absorbed in skin via scalp. The scalp has pores like the face. The same with hair coloring it's chemicals unless you use henna dye. Look at ingredients. Be safe
DESDE QUE LO USO HACE 2 MESES, SE ME CAE MUCHO MENOS EL PELO. ES MAS, YA NO SE CAE. HUELE DELICIOSO AHORA SI, ES MUY CARO. PERO COMO DICE EL DICHO, LO BUENO SALE CARO
